wikipedia_page.main: Morgan Williams (born 28 December 1995) is a Welsh rugby union player. A wing or full-back, he plays rugby for the Scarlets. having previously played for Aberavon RFC. Williams has also played for the Wales Sevens team, and so far has played in nine tournaments.

response: *Morgan Williams (ecologist) (born 1943), former Parliamentary Commissioner for the Environment in New Zealand
